sentences.english: The Reclining Buddha Temple is one of those temples well-known in Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 卧佛寺是在东南亚一带享有盛名的寺庙之一。

sentences.english: Travel from Wofo Mountain Villa, its distance about 200 meters. You will arrive the old dragon lake.
sentences.chinese: 从卧佛山庄出发，北行200米，可到达古老的龙潭。

sentences.english: The White Jade Reclining Buddha is the biggest jade Buddha extant in China.
sentences.chinese: 白玉卧佛是中国现存最大的玉佛。

sentences.english: The big bell in the Temple of Reclining Buddha was recast in the sixteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 卧佛寺的大钟是16世纪重新铸造的。

definition: rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
niche for statue (esp. Buddhist, Christian etc)
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
seated image (of a Buddha or saint)
Buddhist image/statue of Buddha or Bodhisattva/CL:尊[zun1], 張|张[zhang1]
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
Bodhimanda (place of enlightenment associated with a Bodhisattva)
icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
